fever,cough,sore throat.triage: See a doctor if fever persists >3 days or severe symptoms appear

chest pain,sweating,nausea.tips: Call emergency services, stay calm and still

headache,nausea,sensitivity to light.triage: Self-care or primary doctor if frequent
headache,nausea,sensitivity to light.tips: Dark room, hydration, OTC pain relievers

abdominal pain,diarrhea,vomiting.triage: Doctor if symptoms persist >2 days or signs of dehydration
